data.comment: The match has started at Estadio La Corregidora.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 4, Queretaro's Kevin Ramirez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Yairo Moreno for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 7, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Queretaro have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 12, Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon pushes forward through Angel Mena, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Leon.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Leon throw-in in Queretaro's half.
In the minute 19, Leon take a 0-1 lead thanks to Angel Mena.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Queretaro.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Emanuel Gigliotti gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro are pushing forward but Kevin Ramirez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, Leon have a goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Santiago de Queretaro Queretaro attack through Sebastian Sosa. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
In the minute 32, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Santiago de Queretaro to check on Fernando Madrigal, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 37, Fernando Madrigal returns to the field for Queretaro after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 39, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Leon in the half of Queretaro.
Emanuel Gigliotti (Leon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leon's Nicolas Sosa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Alfonso Luna for Queretaro drives towards goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the finish is unsuccessful.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Leon.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Omar Arellano is replacing Sebastian Sosa for the home team.
Leon are coming forward and Luis Montes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Leon's Angel Mena breaks free at Estadio La Corregidora. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, In Santiago de Queretaro Queretaro drive forward through Omar Arellano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Queretaro throw-in in Leon's half.
Important block from the Queretaro defence as Angel Mena fires in a strike for Leon.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Leon close to the penalty box.
Erik Vera for Queretaro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Leon a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Leon at Estadio La Corregidora.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Leon drives forward and Pedro Aquino gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 56, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Free kick Queretaro.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 60, Angel Sepulveda of Queretaro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio La Corregidora.
Alex Diego (Queretaro) is making a second substitution, with Francisco Da Costa replacing Angel Sepulveda.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 64, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Francisco Da Costa for Queretaro who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 66, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Leon.
Queretaro's Francisco Da Costa looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 68, Goal! Queretaro draw level to 1-1 through a Omar Arellano header.
Great play from Gonzalo Montes to set up the goal.
In the minute 70, In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pedro Aquino (Leon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Estadio La Corregidora, Yairo Moreno has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Queretaro have been given a penalty...
In the minute 73, Goal! Queretaro take a 2-1 lead thanks to a Kevin Ramirez spot-kick..
Leon have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Emanuel Gigliotti grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 78, Kevin Ramirez (Queretaro) gets a yellow card.
Francisco Da Costa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goal! A Emanuel Gigliotti header gives Leon a 2-3 lead in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 81, Francisco Da Costa is back on his feet again.
Free kick Queretaro.
The away team have replaced Nicolas Sosa with Jesse Zamudio. This is the first substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Leon.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Leon a goal kick.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 88, Jonathan Betancourt is replacing Irving Zurita for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 89, The away team replace Angel Mena with Jose Godinez.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Queretaro capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio La Corregidora.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-3.
Leon make their third substitution with Juan Ignacio Gonzalez replacing Emanuel Gigliotti.
